author: ehu
msg: Implementation of reverting props after wc to wc replacements.
(prop_path_internal): Change two boolean parameters to prop_path_kind_t enum.
Return revert prop filename if path_kind==prop_path_kind_revert.
(svn_wc__prop_revert_path): New function that returns revert prop filename.
svn_wc__prop_base_path): Tweak to use new prop_path_internal() signature.
(remove_revert_file): New static helper for svn_wc_process_committed2() that
(svn_wc_process_committed2): Remove prop revert file after commit.
(revert_admin_things): Use revert prop file as prop base for reverting.
dst_bprop variables to begin of function. Save prop base if we're
(SVN_WC__ADM_DIR_PROP_REVERT): New define for dir-prop revert filename.

author: julianfoad
msg: Correct an accidental lack of checking in the regression tests.  The expected
stderr was often specified as "None" (meaning ignore it) where "[]" (meaning
no output) was intended, so the tests were not as strict as they should be.
Prevent this particular case from happening again by disallowing "None" as the
"expected_stderr" argument of the two functions involved, since its meaning
was too confusing and that facility doesn't appear to be needed.  If it is
needed in future, it should be handled by something similar to "SVNAnyOutput".
Pass "[]" instead of "None" for "expected_stderr" in calls to

author: julianfoad
msg: New XFail test for diff on a renamed directory, for issue #2333.
(test_list): Add the new test, as XFail.
